OCC.DAT:
variables string UTL_CONTEXT1 string UTL_CONTEXT2 string UTL_DLUPENTLST ; See constant string UTL_ENTSTATUS ; Std trigger string UTL_TPL ; See constant string UTL_TPLVER ; See constant string UTL_TRGSTATUS ; Std trigger string UTL_USERID ; Userid string UTL_WRUPENTLST ; See constant endvariables #define BreakInheritance_cpt_GENERAL #Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME=UTL_SERV_XXX1 #Comment
#Comment end_of_references
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_mappings #ifdefined UENTITY #info symbol UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UENTITY=SBIL1015.SMM #Comment
#ifdefined UNQ_UENTITY #info symbol UNQ_UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UNQ_UENTITY=SBIL1015 #Comment
#ifdefined UENTITY #info symbol UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UENTITY=SCOE1015.SMM #Comment
#ifdefined UNQ_UENTITY #info symbol UNQ_UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UNQ_UENTITY=SCOE1015 #Comment
#Comment end_of_mappings
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_symbols #Comment end_of_symbols
#Comment ----------------------------------------------

entry LP_COMPUTEQTY variables numeric numOverRun numeric numDelta endvariables if(overrun.SPRD0110>0) numOverRun=overrun.SPRD0110 elseif(corinvoverrun.SPAR3000>0) numOverRun=corinvoverrun.SPAR3000 else numOverRun=0 endif if(numOverRun>0) qtyoninvoice.SBIL1015=qtyconfirmed.SCOE1015 numDelta=(qtyoninvoice.SBIL1015/qtyord.SCOE1010-1) if(numDelta>numOverRun) qtyoninvoice.SBIL1015=qtyord.SCOE1010*(100+numOverRun)/100 endif else qtyoninvoice.SBIL1015=qtyconfirmed.SCOE1015 endif return end
entry LP_BEFINIT done
entry LP_AFTINIT done
entry LP_BEFCLEANUP done
entry LP_AFTCLEANUP done
entry LP_BEFACPT done
entry LP_AFTACPT done
entry LP_BEFQUIT done
entry LP_AFTQUIT done
entry LP_BEFASYS done
entry LP_AFTASYS done
operation PrepForBill params string strEntity :IN numeric numTk :INOUT endparams variables string strTemp date dtDateShip endvariables
clear
getlistitems/occ strEntity,"SCOE1015" ;SMM_CR00638 (Add begin) getitem/id dtDateShip, strEntity, "DATESHIPPED" ;SMM_CR00638 (Add end) setocc "SCOE1015" retrieve/e "SCOE1015" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("RETRIEVE",$status,"") exit -1 endif
;PMA20041126 - Re-activated 26-nov-2004 to avoid duplicate ;---------------------------------------------------------
;if(vrinvoicestat.SCOE1015!=3) exit -1 ;to avoid duplicate
if(numTk=0) tkinvoicehead.SBIL1010="" validatefield tkinvoicehead.SBIL1010 billto.SBIL1010=customer.SCOE1005 billtoseq.SBIL1010=customerseq.SCOE1005 shipto.SBIL1010=shipto.SCOE1015 shiptoseq.SBIL1010=shiptoseq.SCOE1015 vrinvoicetype.SBIL1010=1 vrinvheadstat.SBIL1010=1 ;Pending owncompany.SBIL1010=owncompany.SCOE1015 ownbranch.SBIL1010=ownbranch.SCOE1015 flggrp.SBIL1010="FALSE" else tkinvoicehead.SBIL1010/init=numTk retrieve/e "SBIL1010" clear/e "SBIL1015" endif
setocc "SCOE1015",1 ;SMM_CR00638 (Add begin) if (dateshipped.SCOE1015 != dtDateShip) dateshipped.SCOE1015 = dtDateShip endif ;SMM_CR00638 (Add end) strTemp="VRTYPESO&uSEP;TOTAREA&uSEP;OWNCOMPANY&uSEP;OWNBRANCH&uSEP;DELIVERYSLIP&uSEP;DELIVERYLINE&uSEP;CUSTMEMO&uSEP;DATESHIPPED&uSEP;DATECONFIRMED&uSEP;SHIPTO&uSEP;SHIPTOSEQ&uSEP;SALESMANTYPE&uSEP;SALESMAN&uSEP;QTYSHIPPED&uSEP;WHOSHIPPED&uSEP;QTYCONFIRMED&uSEP;WHOCONFIRMED&uSEP;UOMQTY&uSEP;VRZONE&uSEP;AMOUNTGROSS&uSEP;AMOUNTCOD&uSEP;PRICESELLING&uSEP;UOMPRICESELL&uSEP;COSTUNIT&uSEP;UOMCOSTUNIT&uSEP;COMMISSION&uSEP;VRSLSDIV&uSEP;TAXPROCEDURE&uSEP;VRTERM&uSEP;VRCHARGE&uSEP;CUSTOMERPO&uSEP;SHIPVIA&uSEP;OWNCOMP &uBS;ANY&uSEP;OWNBRANCH" putlistitems/id/field strTemp setocc "SBIL1015" tkinvoiceline.SBIL1015="" validatefield tkinvoiceline.SBIL1015 numTk=tkinvoiceline.SBIL1015 getlistitems/occ strTemp,"SBIL1015" billto.SBIL1015=customer.SCOE1005 billtoseq.SBIL1015=customerseq.SCOE1005 flgordcomplete.SBIL1015=flgordcomplete.SCOE1015 vrinvlinestat.SBIL1015=2 ;Ready flginvcred.SBIL1015="TRUE" tkproduct.SBIL1015=tkproduct.SCOE1010 item.SBIL1015=item.SCOE1010 ;customerpo.SBIL1015=customerpo.SCOE1010
clear/e "SPAR0027" company.SPAR0027/init=owncompany.SCOE1015 branch.SPAR0027/init=ownbranch.SCOE1015 vrprdtype.SPAR0027/init=vrprdtype.SPRD0100 vrslsdiv.SPAR0027/init=vrslsdiv.SCOE1015 retrieve/e "SPAR0027" if($status=0) account.SBIL1015=account.SPAR0027 chart.SBIL1015=chart.SPAR0027 costctr.SBIL1015=costctr.SPAR0027 else call SMM_GETDEF("SBIL1015","ACCOUNT",account.SBIL1015) call SMM_GETDEF("SBIL1015","CHART",chart.SBIL1015) costctr.SBIL1015=costctr.SBIL1015 validatefield costctr.SBIL1015 endif
;company.SPAR3000/init=$$utl_context1 ;branch.SPAR3000/init=$$utl_context2 customer.SPAR3000/init=billto.SBIL1015 retrieve/e "SPAR3000"
call LP_COMPUTEQTY
;PMA20120222 (Add begin) if($hits(SCOE1240)>0) billoflading.SBIL1015=billoflading.SCOE1240 endif ;PMA20120222 (Add end)
if($hits(SCOE1017)>0) setocc "SCOE1017",1 while($status>0) creocc "SBIL1017",-1 narrative.SBIL1017=narrative.SCOE1017 vrnartype.SBIL1017=vrnartype.SCOE1017 setocc "SCOE1017",$curocc(SCOE1017)+1 endwhile endif
if($hits(SCOE1250)>0) setocc "SCOE1250",1 strTemp="ADDRESS&uSEP;ADDRSTATE&uSEP;CITY&uSEP;COUNTRY&uSEP;STREET&uSEP;POSTCODE&uSEP;PROVCOD&uSEP;STREET&uSEP;DESCR&uSEP;SUBURB&uSEP;VRZONE" putlistitems/id/field strTemp creocc "SBIL1350",-1 getlistitems/occ strTemp,"SBIL1350" endif
;if($hits(SCOE1150)>0) ; setocc "SCOE1150",1 ; while($status>0) ; strTemp="ACCOUNT&uSEP;CHART&uSEP;TAXABLEAMT&uSEP;TAXAMT&uSEP;TAXPERC&uSEP;VRTAXCODE" ; putlistitems/id/field strTemp ; creocc "SBIL1150",-1 ; getlistitems/occ strTemp,"SBIL1150" ; setocc "SCOE1150",$curocc(SCOE1150)+1 ; endwhile ;endif
if($hits(SCOE1160)>0) setocc "SCOE1160",1 while($status>0) strTemp="ACCOUNT&uSEP;CHART&uSEP;COMMISSION&uSEP;COSTUNIT&uSEP;DESCR&uSEP;EXTRACHARGE&uSEP;PRICEUNIT&uSEP;QUANTITY&uSEP;UOMCOSTUNIT&uSEP;UOMPRICEUNIT&uSEP;FLGDISCOUNT&uSEP;FLGTAXABLE&uSEP;AMOUNTNET&uSEP;VRAPPLTYPE&uSEP;CHARGEPERC" putlistitems/id/field strTemp creocc "SBIL1160",-1 getlistitems/occ strTemp,"SBIL1160" tkseqbilchg.SBIL1160="" validatefield tkseqbilchg.SBIL1160 ;SMM_CR00800 (Add begin) vrslsdiv.SBIL1160 = vrslsdiv.SPAR1140 ;SMM_CR00800 (Add end)
; if($hits(SCOE1165)>0) ; setocc "SCOE1165",1 ; while($status>0) ; strTemp="ACCOUNT&uSEP;CHART&uSEP;TAXABLEAMT&uSEP;TAXAMT&uSEP;;TAXPERC&uSEP;VRTAXCODE" ; putlistitems/id/field strTemp ; creocc "SBIL1165",-1 ; getlistitems/occ strTemp,"SBIL1165" ; setocc "SCOE1165",$curocc(SCOE1165)+1 ; endwhile ; endif if($hits(SCOE1162)>0) setocc "SCOE1162",1 while($status>0) creocc "SBIL1162",-1 vrnartype.SBIL1162=vrnartype.SCOE1162 narrative.SBIL1162=narrative.SCOE1162 setocc "SCOE1162",$curocc(SCOE1162)+1 endwhile endif
setocc "SCOE1160",$curocc(SCOE1160)+1 endwhile endif
if(address.SCOE1005!="") setocc "SCOE1005",1 strTemp="ADDRESS&uSEP;ADDRSTATE&uSEP;CITY&uSEP;COUNTRY&uSEP;STREET&uSEP;POSTCODE&uSEP;PROVCOD&uSEP;STREET&uSEP;DESCR&uSEP;SUBURB&uSEP;VRZONE" putlistitems/id/field strTemp getlistitems/occ strTemp,"SBIL1320" endif setocc "SBIL1010" store/e "SBIL1010" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("STORE",$status,"") rollback exit -1 else setocc "SBIL1015" ;necessary to recompute reload/nolock ;the amountcod and amountgross amountcod.SBIL1015=amountcod.SBIL1015 store/e "SBIL1015" ;PMA20080501 (Change begin) ;vrinvoicestat.SCOE1015=0 if (vrinvoicestat.SCOE1015 != "2") vrinvoicestat.SCOE1015=0 ;PMA20080501 (Change begin) setocc "SCOE1015" store/e "SCOE1015" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("STORE",$status) rollback exit -1 else commit exit 0 endif endif exit 0 end
operation BEFWRIT variables string strSo numeric numSo numeric numTk numeric numQty endvariables if($entname="SBIL1015") strSo=salesorder.SCOE1010 numSo=soline.SCOE1010 numTk=tkinvoiceline.SBIL1015 numQty=0 activate "SMM_SCOE1010_007".GetTotInvQty(strSo,numSo,numTk,numQty) qtytotinvoiced.SBIL1015=numQty putmess "QUANTITY ALREADY INVOICED IS %%qtytotinvoiced.SBIL1015%%%" return endif end
Operation EXEREAD if ($entname = "SCOE1240") read order by "billoflading desc" $result = -1 endif End
